instructions: Image titled Contact Motorola Step 1 1 Place a call for the easiest way to reach Motorola. If you would like to have a person-to-person conversation, dial the general inquiries line at 1-800-668-6765. They're open Monday to Friday 7 a.m.-10 p.m. and Saturday to Sunday 9 a.m.-6 p.m. CT. [1] Image titled Contact Motorola Step 2 2 Start an online chat for quick replies. You can have a conversation with a customer service representative in real time without a phone. You will need to provide your name, email address, and topic to begin. Go to https://mobilesupport.lenovo.com/us/en/ , and then: Click on Contact Us then click on Chat with Us. Fill in the fields with your information. Click on Chat Live and begin your conversation. [2] Image titled Contact Motorola Step 3 3 Connect on Facebook Messenger if you'd rather talk via social media. If you prefer social media platforms, go to https://mobilesupport.lenovo.com/us/en/ , click on Contact Us, then click on the Facebook Messenger icon. You will be redirected to Messenger. Click on Get Started and enter your message. You will be connected with a live agent or a smart bot will respond. [3] Advertisement
